featured.text: Try home exchanges－swapping houses with strangers.
After making a fortune by writing novels, he built a mansion outside Paris and kept it open to starving artists, friends, and even strangers.
When he came to, he saw a stranger beside him.
(31) I was walking to the beach, a stranger came up to me and tried to shake my hand.

definition.en_def: A person whom one does not know.
definition.example: She felt nervous walking alone in the city among strangers.
